name: Something's Fishy (Paulc)
description:
This is a simple endless-runner game where you are a fish (a perch, if you need to know) and need to collect worms and avoid enemies underwater.

You have 3 lives.

Avoid:

Pikes (the big fish that are attacking you).

Swimming into stones and stone arches.

Worms that have a hook in them - you'll lose a life, collect 3 and you're dead.

All assets made by me in Blender. Textures done in Substance Painter and Photoshop.

Sounds from https://www.zapsplat.com/
